translation.en: [Femi] How the hell did you unlock my car?
translation.zh: ‎我车门上了锁 你怎么打开的？

translation.en: Same amount when you get the job done.
translation.zh: ‎这是一半酬劳 事成之后付你另一半

translation.en: [in Pidgin English] Still want me to do it at the wedding?
Yeah.
You know you are really crazy?
translation.zh: ‎你真是个疯子 你知道吗？

translation.en: [in English] Can you just get the job done?
There is only one pharmaceutical company in this country that has the experience,
translation.zh: ‎本国只有一家制药公司有经验

translation.en: the size…
the reach,
and the expertise
to succeed with such an undertaking.
That company… is Ademola Pharmaceuticals.
And we look forward to your decision over the next few days.
translation.zh: ‎我们期待诸位几天后的决定

translation.en: And if you have any more questions,
our technical team will be more than happy to answer them.
translation.zh: ‎我们的技术团队很乐意提供解答

translation.en: Now, if you will excuse me,
I really don't want to be late for my own wedding.
translation.zh: ‎我可不想在自己的婚礼上迟到

translation.en: [woman] Kemi.
It's the same as yours.
I had it made specially for you.
Oh, it's so beautiful.
-I know. -Thank you.
Thank you for standing by me all these years.
translation.zh: ‎不 ‎该我谢谢你这么多年的支持和陪伴

translation.en: We stood by each other.
Mm. Sarah...
[in Pidgin English] If not for you, I wouldn't have accomplished half the things in my life.
You want me to cry and ruin my makeup? [Kemi] Please! Please!
translation.zh:
‎-你是想害我把妆都哭花吗？
‎-拜托！

translation.en: Just don't abandon me because you're married.
Eh! God forbid! Good.
[in Yoruba] My goodness, you're so beautiful.
[in Pidgin] Look how beautiful you are. You're also beautiful. Small.
translation.zh:
‎-像个仙女一样
‎-你也很漂亮呀

translation.en: [in English] Girl, you're not serious, I swear.
Is it done?
Yes, my love.
Soon, you'll be king.
Yes.
And I will be your queen.
Yes.
[in Pidgin] This is madness. What happened?
It's Kenny. He won't stop calling me. I swear, he's called, like, 12 times.
translation.zh: ‎是肯尼 ‎他一直给我打电话 得有12通了

translation.en: [in Pidgin] For goodness' sake, not today! Block his number.
translation.zh: ‎老天 今天可不行！ ‎屏蔽他的号码

translation.en: [in English] I've tried. He keeps calling me with different numbers.
translation.zh: ‎我试过了 他会换个号打过来

translation.en: -[man] Hey, babe. -[gasps]
Baby.
-You're here already. -Yeah.
-How was the meeting? -It was good. Pretty good.
translation.zh:
‎-会议还顺利吗？
‎-不错 挺好的

translation.en: -Kemi. -Hi, Kola.
I thought we spoke about this dress.
translation.zh: ‎我们不是说好不穿这条裙子的吗？

translation.en: I… I tried the other one, but, I don't know, I just felt like this one was better.
translation.zh:
‎我试过另一条了
‎但我还是觉得这条更好

translation.en: I don't think so.
[Kemi] Come on, Kola, this dress is perfect.
translation.zh: ‎别闹了 科拉 这条裙子多完美呀

translation.en: The groom is in the house!
Now, I have just 727 things to worry about.
translation.zh: ‎我要担心的状况又少了一条

translation.en: My man, but you know that's why I chose the best man for my best man?
translation.zh:
‎好兄弟 所以我才会
‎选了你这家伙当伴郎呀 是吧？

translation.en: Yeah, let's just hope he lives up to that expectation.
Yeah, and now I have to borrow the best woman to go sort out some schedules, hmm?
translation.zh:
‎那么 容我借用一下伴娘女士
‎梳理一下流程安排

translation.en: [Kola] Change the dress.
Good afternoon, sir.
Room reservation under Okafor.
[woman] Are you here for the wedding?
No.
Business trip.
[in Igbo] Hey! Daddy, look at how wonderful this place is.
translation.zh: ‎她爸 瞧这地方多漂亮呀

translation.en: This place is beautiful.
[in English] Yes. It is nice.
-"Nice"? -Mm. [in Igbo] Am I the only one seeing this?
[in English] It is beautiful.
My dear, this hotel is very fine.
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的 这宾馆很上档次哟

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Oh, thank you. Welcome. Good afternoon.
translation.zh:
‎谢谢夸奖 欢迎光临
‎下午好 二位是来参加婚礼的吗？

translation.en: -Are you here for the wedding? -Ah-ah, it's our ceremony. [chuckles]
translation.zh:
‎谢谢夸奖 欢迎光临
‎下午好 二位是来参加婚礼的吗？ ‎这也是属于我们的仪式
‎我们是新娘的父母

translation.en: -We're the parents of the bride. -Oh!
translation.zh:
‎这也是属于我们的仪式
‎我们是新娘的父母

translation.en: -The one they are carrying. -Oh, wonderful.
-That's my daughter. -Welcome, Mr. and Mrs. Duru.
translation.zh:
‎那是我女儿 ‎欢迎 杜鲁先生和夫人
‎我来拿你们房间的钥匙

translation.en: Let me get you your room key.
translation.zh:
‎欢迎 杜鲁先生和夫人
‎我来拿你们房间的钥匙

translation.en: See, all I am saying is that,
in the Igbo tradition, this engagement will happen in the…
translation.zh: ‎按照伊博族的传统 订婚仪式应该在…

translation.en: [in Igbo] Ifeanyi, who prefers salt to sugar?
translation.zh: ‎伊凡依 别自讨没趣了行吗？

translation.en: [in English] How would we have been able to afford this place?
translation.zh: ‎我们能负担得起这么豪华的场地吗？

translation.en: For the ceremony, in our village?
translation.zh: ‎难道在咱村子里给女儿办婚礼？

translation.en: Focus, please. [scoffs]
[clears throat] Well, here you go. We have you in one of our larger suites.
translation.zh: ‎给您 我们给二位安排了大套房

translation.en: [in Igbo] Did you hear that? Larger suites! [chuckles] It's not just a room!
translation.zh: ‎听见没？大套房！不是普通房间！

translation.en: -[in English] Thank you, my dear. -Yes, uh, enjoy the wedding.
translation.zh:
‎-谢谢你 亲爱的
‎-不客气 祝您婚礼愉快

translation.en: We will! [chuckles]
Mommy, FJ wants to come show you his outfit.
translation.zh: ‎妈咪 FJ想给你看看他的服装

translation.en: The bottom button is undone.
Hey, there he is! -[chuckles] -The man of the hour.
Did you catapult us into a prosperous future?
translation.zh: ‎我们的未来要更上一层楼了吗？

translation.en: Let's just say, I'll be astonished if they give it to any of our competitors.
translation.zh:
‎这么说吧 如果他们最终选择了
‎我们的竞争对手 我会很惊讶的

translation.en: -The pitch was perfect. -That's brilliant, my son.
Hey, FJ my man! Looking sharp, hmm?
-Hope you guys are fine? -Oh yeah, we're good, we're good.
translation.zh:
‎-大伙儿玩得开心吧？
‎-嗯 很好

translation.en: -[sighs] -You changed your dress? Mm, that other one was a bit tight.
translation.zh:
‎-你换裙子了？
‎-原先那条有点紧

translation.en: -[man] Sarah! -If he makes you…
She knows me. Look at her… Sarah, I need to talk to you.
translation.zh: ‎她认识我 莎拉 我有话跟你说

translation.en: Sarah? Just let me talk to her. I need to talk to you, Sarah.
translation.zh:
‎莎拉？ ‎让我跟她说句话就好
‎莎拉 我得跟你谈谈

translation.en: It's-- I know him. It's okay. I know him.
translation.zh: ‎我认识他 没事 我认识他

translation.en: -Sarah, don't do this. -What is this?
I love you. You can't be here.
I'm telling you, you're marrying this guy for the wrong reasons, you know it.
translation.zh:
‎你嫁给这家伙就是为了… ‎-我们总能靠自己努力得到一切的
‎-是

translation.en: [Sarah] Listen to me, you need to leave now.
translation.zh:
‎-我们总能靠自己努力得到一切的
‎-是 ‎你做得很好 太棒了 那…

translation.en: -So… -[chuckles] Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎你做得很好 太棒了 那… ‎对

translation.en: -I love you. Even in his wildest dreams-- -Look at me, I'll call you.
translation.zh:
‎-我从来没这么爱过一个人…
‎-看着我 我回头给你打电话

translation.en: I don't believe this.
-I'm going to tear that bastard to shreds. -Hey. Listen--
Can you imagine the disrespect?
I'll handle it, okay? Just stay out of it.
translation.zh: ‎我来处理 好吗？你别过去

translation.en: -If you love me-- -Come with me--
-Hey, get out of here. Now! -Sarah… Sarah, tell him.
translation.zh:
‎-马上离开这里
‎-莎拉 你告诉他

translation.en: Sarah, don't let them do this. Sarah-- Sarah, you're making a mistake.
translation.zh:
‎莎拉 别让他们赶我走
‎莎拉 别铸成大错！

translation.en: Sarah, I love you. Don't let them do this, Sarah. -[man] Sir-- -[Kenny] I--
translation.zh:
‎-快阻止他们 莎拉
‎-快滚吧你！

translation.en: I know. I'm just trying to talk to her. Get off me now. Guys, re--
translation.zh: ‎我就想跟她说几句 放开我！

translation.en: Sarah, don't do this. Sarah, you're making a mistake. Sarah!
translation.zh: ‎莎拉 别这样！你会后悔的！莎拉！

translation.en: Do not embarrass me this day.
You hear me, my girl? I'm so sorry, Mommy.
translation.zh:
‎-听见了吗 姑娘？
‎-对不起 妈咪

translation.en: I promise, I won't.
What was he doing here?
-Kola-- -I said, what was he doing here?
translation.zh:
‎-科拉…
‎-问你话呢 他怎么来了？

translation.en: I don't know.
I swear.
Have you been in contact with him?
No.
Has he been calling you?
Sarah.
Don't lie to me.
Are you lying to me?
He called a few times.
[Sarah gasping] Kola…
We just want to thank the Ademola family,
especially Kola and Uduak, his mother, for hosting this magnificent engagement.
translation.zh:
‎尤其是科拉和他的妈妈乌达珂
‎在如此豪华的宾馆

translation.en: You know, in this very, very fancy hotel.
[hesitates] I think it is right
translation.zh: ‎此时此刻 我想我们理应…

translation.en: and it is only fitting that, uh, at this point,
translation.zh:
‎此时此刻 我想我们理应… ‎怀念一下那位伟大的男性
‎奥拉达尤阿德默拉

translation.en: we remember the great man himself, Oladayo Ademola, husband to Uduak,
translation.zh:
‎怀念一下那位伟大的男性
‎奥拉达尤阿德默拉 ‎乌达珂的丈夫 科拉和费米的父亲…

translation.en: and, uh, father to Kola, to, uh, Femi and to…
translation.zh: ‎乌达珂的丈夫 科拉和费米的父亲…

translation.en: -Timeyin. -[sputters] And to Timeyin. Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎还有提美茵 ‎还有提美茵 是的

translation.en: We all know how proud he would have been to see his youngest son, uh, tie the knot.
translation.zh: ‎我们都知道 若他看见自己的小儿子 ‎与人共结连理 一定会倍感骄傲的

translation.en: Will he just shut up? Mama.
[in Igbo] But… No!
[in English] All my life, I have always played the lottery.
[Mr. Duru] Every week, the same number. Every week, the same number.
[chuckles] But if you ask me, eh, how much have I won?
I will say absolutely nothing!
translation.zh: ‎那我会说 一毛钱也没有！

translation.en: But, uh, today, I, uh…
I feel I am the luckiest man in the whole of Nigeria.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得自己是尼日利亚最幸运的男人

translation.en: Sit down.
First, I'd like to thank you,
-Mommy and Daddy Duru… -[Mommy] Mm.
…for raising the most beautiful woman I have ever seen.
translation.zh:
‎谢谢你们养育了
‎我这辈子见过的最美的女人

translation.en: -[kisses] And for allowing me marry her. -[Sarah] Mm.
I've been working on a drawing of Sarah
translation.zh: ‎我亲手画了一幅莎拉的肖像

translation.en: that I believe captures her beauty…
translation.zh: ‎相信它充分呈现了她的美貌…

translation.en: [in Igbo] It's beautiful.
[in English] …her grace,
and her poise.
-Mommy and Daddy Duru… -[Mr. Duru] Yeah.
…please accept this as my gift.
[in Igbo] Thank you very much.
[Mr. Duru, in English] Thank you, Kola.
What did I miss? -[Kola] Timeyin! -[both laughing]
-[Timeyin] Congratulations. -You made it.
Do you really think I'd miss your wedding?
translation.zh: ‎你真以为我会错过你的婚礼吗？

translation.en: -You look good. -There you go.
Um, everyone, my daughter, Timeyin, who is studying overseas.
translation.zh:
‎诸位 这是我的女儿提美茵
‎目前正在海外留学

translation.en: Mom, everybody knows I'm in rehab.
translation.zh: ‎妈 谁不知道我在做康复治疗呀

translation.en: -It's the biggest news in Lagos. -[Kola chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎这可是拉各斯的大新闻 ‎别说了

translation.en: You all know I'm in rehab, right?
translation.zh: ‎大伙儿都知道我在戒酒中吧？

translation.en: -[Kola chuckles] -[Timeyin] Now, who do I need to fuck to get a drink around here?
translation.zh:
‎现在 有谁能给我口酒喝吗？
‎我可以跟他上床哦

translation.en: -[Timeyin] Joking. -[Kola chuckles]
Joking! People, relax.
translation.zh: ‎开个玩笑嘛！各位 放轻松！

translation.en: I'm 22 days sober, and I intend to stay that way.
translation.zh: ‎我已经戒酒22天了 没打算复喝

translation.en: -I'm so proud of you. -Thank you.
How I love this son of mine.
So I guess it's too late to talk you out of this.
translation.zh:
‎我看这会儿劝你别结婚
‎已经太迟了吧？

translation.en: Come on, Mom.
You know I have had Abasiama on the phone
translation.zh: ‎你知道我每天都跟阿巴西娅通电话

translation.en: in a flood of tears every day.
Abasiama is always in a flood of tears, Mom.
translation.zh: ‎阿巴西亚总是哭个不停 妈

translation.en: You two made a… wonderful couple.
You were quiet this evening.
Was I?
Just tired.
What's wrong?
[groans softly] Nothing. I just…
I just want to change.
Sarah.
[emphatically] Sarah.
How long have we known each other?
[in Pidgin] What's up?
[whispers, in English] He hit me.
Kola hit you?
Again?!
Sarah, you promised me!
[in Pidgin] You told me the last time
that if he hits you again you'll leave him.
translation.zh: ‎他要是再打你 你就离开他

translation.en: [in English] You promised me, babes.
[sobbing] It's Kenny. It's this whole Kenny thing.
-He made him so angry. -Stop making excuses for this animal!
translation.zh:
‎-他很生气…
‎-别再为那禽兽找借口了

translation.en: -We have to call off this wedding. -Eh?
We're calling off this wedding.
Kemi, what are you saying? I'm getting married tomorrow.
translation.zh:
‎凯蜜 你说什么呢？
‎我明天就要结婚了

translation.en: So you're ready to get married to a man who does this to you?
translation.zh:
‎你真的要嫁给一个
‎会对你大打出手的男人吗？

translation.en: Jesus, Sarah!
[in Pidgin] Do you want to be his personal punching bag for the rest of your life?
translation.zh: ‎你想下半辈子都给他当人肉沙包吗？

translation.en: [in English] Is that what you want?
Keep an eye on Timeyin.
There are enough things to embarrass me
without her going on one of her binges.
Uncle B.
What are you doing?
Did Mother send you to watch me?
I'm not going to drink or take drugs or…
translation.zh: ‎放心吧 我不会喝酒、嗑药 或者…

translation.en: have sex with this bar man.
[scoffs, in Igbo] I don't understand.
Please explain to me.
[in English] Speak clearly.
I said…
I don't think I can do this thing.
[in Igbo] What do you mean by "this thing"?
[in English] Get married.
To Kola.
Tell me you're joking.
He beats me.
[in Igbo] What did you do?
[emphatically, in English] He beats me.
[in Igbo] My daughter, I'm sure it can't be that bad.
translation.zh:
‎女儿 我相信
‎事情一定没你想的那么糟

translation.en: What do you think would happen when your ex-boyfriend turned up?
translation.zh:
‎你指望他怎么样？
‎你前男友跑来婚礼现场

translation.en: [in English] Constitutionally nuisance.
Have you stopped to think how embarrassing
translation.zh: ‎你有没有想过 ‎这会让科拉和他们一家人多难堪呀？

translation.en: that could have been for Kola and the whole family?
translation.zh: ‎这会让科拉和他们一家人多难堪呀？

translation.en: [exhales] It wasn't my fau… I didn't even know Kenny was coming.
translation.zh:
‎可那不能怪我啊
‎我又不知道肯尼要来

translation.en: He came to see you.
But I didn't know he was coming! Mommy, I'm telling you that Kola hurts me.
translation.zh:
‎但我不知道他要来！
‎妈妈 我是在跟你说科拉打了我

translation.en: [chuckles softly] Okay, okay.
So you're telling me
[in Igbo] that you want to let go?
translation.zh: ‎所以你是在跟我说… ‎你想放弃了？

translation.en: [in English] You're willing to let go of everything…
[in Igbo] because of one slap?
Sarah! [in English] One slap!
[in Igbo] God forbid.
I know this is the work of my enemies. They will not succeed.
translation.zh:
‎一定是我的敌人在从中作梗
‎他们休想得逞

translation.en: [in English] Do you have any idea…
the sacrifices your father and I have made…
translation.zh: ‎我和你爸爸做出了多少牺牲

translation.en: to place you where you are today?
Look at me. Look at me.
A few years ago, did I used to look like this?
translation.zh: ‎几年以前 我能打扮这么体面吗？

translation.en: [in Igbo] It's because of the money.
[in English] That is what money does.
So, you think your father's business
would have survived a day without the support and help
translation.zh: ‎没了阿德默拉家的支持和帮助

translation.en: from this family.
So you're not the only one involved,
translation.zh: ‎这场婚姻不是你一个人的事

translation.en: the only one to think about in this situation, are you?
translation.zh: ‎你不能只考虑自己 知道吗？

translation.en: [in Igbo] Wipe your tears.
[in English] Let your face glow as the bride to be.
-[Kola] Aunty, it's good to see you. -Kola.
Kola. Kola.
Hey, Abby. Hey.
Hey, Abby. Hey! You look so handsome.
Chai, let me kiss you one last time as a single man.
translation.zh:
‎唉 让我在你结婚前
‎再吻你最后一次吧

translation.en: Kola, are you really going to do this?
Yes. I am.
Too bad for me, I guess.
Hey. I cannot be dealing with this,
not right now.
[in Yourba] Kola, please don't do this.
[inhales] [in English] Abby, this is not appropriate.
It isn't.
Please, excuse me.
Thank you for coming.
-[panting] -What the fuck is this?
Who sent you?
Did my brother send you?
You know the guy?
What?
The guy being taken out there. Looks like you know him.
translation.zh: ‎被带出去的那个人 你似乎认识他

translation.en: No, I don't know him.
I don't.
Femi…
Did you hire the guy to kill me?
What do you mean?
When this wedding is done…
I'm coming for you.
-Hey. -What's going on?
If anything happens to me, look to our brother.
translation.zh: ‎若我有任何不测 当心我们的哥哥

translation.en: What do you mean, what's happened?
translation.zh: ‎你这话什么意思 怎么回事？

translation.en: Doesn't matter.
Look… whatever's happened, right now, you need to forget about it.
translation.zh:
‎听着 无论发生了什么事
‎都先把它抛到脑后吧

translation.en: Hmm? Focus on your wedding.
Yeah. Come here.
He knows.
What?
The guy we sent to him, he caught him himself.
translation.zh: ‎我们派过去的人 被他亲手抓住了

translation.en: -Hey. -Hey. [chuckles]
Good to have you. Madam.
[man] How are you? Good to see you.
Welcome. Good evening, Ma.
We need to get you and the ladies underway, huh?
translation.zh: ‎你得去和女士们做好准备了 ‎好的

translation.en: Hey.
-Sarah wants to talk to Kola. -Right now?
Yes.
[exhales] The engagement is about to start.
There will be no engagement unless she speaks to him right now.
translation.zh:
‎要是他不立刻去跟她谈
‎订婚就可以取消了

translation.en: -[chuckles] Let's go. -Yeah.
Everything okay?
-[man] Hi. -Hey.
You promised me. The last time this happened.
You said it would never happen again.
translation.zh: ‎你说这种事再也不会发生了

translation.en: I was going to leave. [sobs]
But you said it was never going to happen again.
I made a mistake.
Yes.
And so have I.
-Sarah-- -This whole thing is a mistake.
Sarah, no.
Sarah.
I don't want to marry you, Kola.
translation.zh: ‎我不想跟你结婚了 科拉

translation.en: No.
-No. -I don't want to marry you.
Sarah, you cannot do this, not now.
I'm doing it.
Everyone is here. I'm done.
-The hall's packed with people we invited. -Someone will need to tell them.
translation.zh:
‎-大堂里坐满了人
‎-让人去通知大家吧

translation.en: They came from all over…
If you want, I can go and tell them why this wedding is not going to hold.
translation.zh:
‎你要想的话
‎我可以去跟他们解释婚礼为什么取消

translation.en: Sarah, listen to me.
You will not do this.
You hear me?
You will not embarrass me, embarrass my family.
translation.zh: ‎你不能让我、让我的家族颜面扫地

translation.en: You will not.
I'm not marrying you, Kola.
-I'm not marrying you, Kola. -You will marry me.
translation.zh:
‎-你会嫁给我
‎-我不嫁 科拉！

translation.en: -You will marry me. -I'm not marrying you!
-[grunts] -[screams] Oh my God.
-[gasps] -You disrespect me today? -You dare? -[choking]
translation.zh: ‎你敢在今天对我不敬？你竟敢？

translation.en: Kola!
Kola! Kola!
[panting] Sarah.
Fucking bitch!
I'm going to kill the both of you.
Kemi…
Why does he have a gun? Why does he have a gun?
-I don't know. -Why?
Kola?
Is he…
[whispering] Check… Check… Check the pulse.
[whispers] What do we do?
Oh…
Okay.
-Hey. -Oh.
-[chuckles nervously] Hi. -Hey, Kemi.
I'm not sure you're aware,
but they're like 200 people outside waiting to see an engagement.
translation.zh: ‎外面还有200个人等着看订婚仪式呢

translation.en: Oh, yeah, we know, we'll be down soon.
translation.zh: ‎我们知道 我们马上过去

translation.en: -[Kemi] Huh? -Is everything okay?
Yeah, sure. Of course. Why not?
I mean, of… Yeah, there was-- there was a bit of hiccup in there, um,
translation.zh: ‎我是说 当然…对 出了点小问题

translation.en: but a bit of makeup. Great.
-[chuckles] -Uh, sure. Is Kola in there?
No. I mean, yes. Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎不在 我是说 对 嗯…

translation.en: [sputters] He was here. Normal pre-wedding jitters,
translation.zh: ‎他先前在这 有点婚前焦虑 那很正常

translation.en: but he's left already, just a few minutes ago.
translation.zh: ‎但他已经走了 刚走没几分钟

translation.en: Oh, uh, I must have missed him on my way up. Yeah, sure.
translation.zh:
‎-看来我上楼时跟他错过了
‎-一定是的

translation.en: Uh, that's fine. I'll go find him.
But please get Sarah down as soon as possible.
translation.zh: ‎但是拜托你尽快带莎拉下来

translation.en: -No problem. Of course. -[door slams]
translation.zh:
‎-好吗？
‎-没问题 当然 回见

translation.en: -What did you say? -[panting]
I said you would be down as soon as possible.
What? Wha…
We can't. We-- Kemi, Kola is dead.
translation.zh: ‎我们不能去 凯蜜 科拉死了

translation.en: Nobody knows that. Nobody knows where he is.
translation.zh: ‎没人知道他死了 没人知道他在哪儿

translation.en: We need to move him to the bathroom. Move.
translation.zh: ‎我们得把他挪到厕所去 ‎让一让 快啊 我们一起来

translation.en: Come on. Let's go.
translation.zh: ‎让一让 快啊 我们一起来

translation.en: Kola?
[Mrs. Duru] Sarah, open the door.
-That's my mother. -I know.
Here. I'll take care of it.
[Mrs. Duru] Sarah, open the door.
Oh shit.
-Is someone in here? -Yeah, Aunty.
-Aunty, good afternoon. -Kemi! -What is holding you girls? -Nothing.
translation.zh:
‎-阿姨 下午好
‎-凯蜜 你们在磨蹭什么呢？

translation.en: People are waiting. Have you seen outside? Where is she?
translation.zh:
‎-没什么
‎-大伙儿都在外面等着呢 ‎她人呢？

translation.en: [in Igbo] Now my mind is at peace. Look how beautiful my daughter is.
translation.zh: ‎这下我可安心了 瞧我女儿多漂亮呀

translation.en: [in Igbo] My only daughter.
You are as pretty as God made you.
[in English] No, no. Don't spoil your makeup.
[in Igbo] I've prayed to God for today.
translation.zh: ‎我曾向上天祈祷这一天的到来

translation.en: [in English] Everything is going to be fine.
[softly] I'm very proud of you.
Outside.
Everyone is gathered.
Who are they gathered for?
[in Igbo] Me.
Yes, you, exactly.
[in English] You look so amazing.
[in Igbo] Let's show them.
[in Igbo] My daughter.
[in English] They tell me that, uh, you have brought a man.
translation.zh: ‎我听说你带了一个男人过来

translation.en: -[both chuckle] -You want to marry?
Eh? [chuckles]
Okay. Well…
Here, take.
Go and find him and then bring him to me.
translation.zh: ‎去找到他 把他带来让我瞧瞧吧

translation.en: -Eh? Okay. -[Mrs. Duru] Mm.
translation.zh:
‎去找到他 把他带来让我瞧瞧吧 ‎-好
‎-站起来

translation.en: [in Igbo] Now stand.
-[Mr. Duru, in English] Okay. [chuckles] -Thank you.
-Something is wrong. -Mm? [in Igbo] Looks like Kola is absent.
translation.zh: ‎有点不对劲 科拉好像不在

translation.en: -Sarah? -Huh.
What in God's name is going on?
I can't find him anywhere.
What does this mean?
I don't know. He just vanished.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 他突然失踪了

translation.en: You will have to tell people.
I don't understand. Tell them what?
I don't know, Akin, but someone has to tell them something.
translation.zh:
‎我怎么知道 阿金
‎但总得有人跟大家说点什么

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen,
I would like to…
apologize for the, um,
interruption to the schedule.
[exhales] We are dealing with some unforeseen circumstances.
translation.zh: ‎我们正在处理一些突发状况

translation.en: Uh, so, um… But please enjoy,
carry on with the lovely food and drinks available.
We'll-- We'll-- We'll recommence proceedings as soon as we can. Okay?
translation.zh:
‎我们会尽快
‎进入接下来的流程 好吗？

translation.en: Thank you.
This is weird.
[Akin] Yeah, there's something very wrong going on.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 肯定是出了什么大问题

translation.en: -I am not so sure. -What?
I think at the very last moment Kola has come to his senses.
translation.zh: ‎我想科拉是在最后一刻悬崖勒马了

translation.en: What do you mean?
I mean, he took a look at this whole circus.
translation.zh: ‎意思就是 他看到了这群小丑

translation.en: This pathetic family from the village
translation.zh:
‎他未婚妻的娘家
‎小村子里来的可悲家族

translation.en: that he was marrying into, and he just couldn't do it.
translation.zh:
‎他未婚妻的娘家
‎小村子里来的可悲家族 ‎然后他反悔了

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh:
‎-这我可说不好
‎-我不这么认为

translation.en: -Yeah, I don't think that's it. -I think that is what's happened.
translation.zh:
‎-这我可说不好
‎-我不这么认为 ‎我认为就是这么一回事

translation.en: -He would have told me. -Exactly.
translation.zh:
‎-他要是反悔 一定会告诉我
‎-没错

translation.en: He just took to the hills.
And even though this whole fiasco will cost me an arm and a leg,
translation.zh: ‎虽然这场失败的婚礼浪费了我不少钱

translation.en: I'd rather take the hit now
than be saddled with those
translation.zh: ‎总好过让我后半辈子都跟那帮…

translation.en: peasants for the rest of my life.
[Mr. Duru] Sarah, I do not understand.
Eh? What happened?
-Daddy, I don't know. -Ah. Where is Kola?
translation.zh:
‎-爸爸 我不知道
‎-科拉人呢？

translation.en: -I don't know. -Does he not want this marriage again?
translation.zh:
‎-我不知道
‎-他这是又不想结婚了吗？

translation.en: Da… How many times do I have to say I do not know?
translation.zh: ‎我得跟你说多少次呀 我不知道

translation.en: Don't be rude to your father.
[in Igbo] What is happening?
I'm not being rude. I honestly don't know.
translation.zh: ‎我没顶嘴 我真的不知道

translation.en: If this marriage doesn't happen…
would it affect the loan?
Daddy…
[in Igbo] please give me one minute to talk to Sarah alone.
translation.zh: ‎请给我一分钟时间单独跟莎拉谈谈

translation.en: No, because honestly, we really need that money.
translation.zh: ‎不是 我们真的很需要那笔钱

translation.en: -Ifi. Ifi. -[Mr. Duru] Our life depends on the money.
translation.zh:
‎伊菲 ‎-我们指着那笔钱过日子呢
‎-就一分钟 拜托

translation.en: -[Mrs. Duru, in Igbo] One minute, please. -Okay… This… Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-我们指着那笔钱过日子呢
‎-就一分钟 拜托 ‎好吧 这… ‎好

translation.en: [Mrs. Duru] Sarah.
You had better tell me exactly what is going on.
translation.zh: ‎你最好告诉我到底发生了什么事

translation.en: Does this have anything to do
with that nonsense you were talking about last night?
translation.zh:
‎这跟你昨晚和我说的 ‎-那堆胡话有关系吗？
‎-没有

translation.en: No.
[in Igbo] They're testing me.
If my enemies try me, they'll see me.
translation.zh:
‎敌人要想试探我
‎就让他们见识我的厉害

translation.en: God, you will not put me to shame. No!
translation.zh: ‎你们休想让我丢脸 没门儿！

translation.en: He ran away?
[in English] He's running from you.
The free lunch is over, people.
Our lawyers will be in touch in the morning.
translation.zh: ‎我们的律师明早会联系你们

translation.en: [sobbing] It was self-defense. He was trying to kill me.
translation.zh: ‎那是正当防卫 他当时想杀了我

translation.en: It doesn't matter. It doesn't matter. Don't you know these people?
translation.zh:
‎那根本不重要
‎你还不了解这些人吗？

translation.en: Babe, calm down.
I killed their golden son. They'll lkill me and tear me to pieces.
translation.zh:
‎科拉是他们的宝贝儿子
‎他们会杀了我的 我会被大卸八块

translation.en: Okay, so what are we going to do?
translation.zh:
‎科拉是他们的宝贝儿子
‎他们会杀了我的 我会被大卸八块 ‎我们该怎么办？
‎科拉的尸体就躺在我房间里呢

translation.en: -Kola's body is right there in my room. -We need to get him out of here.
translation.zh:
‎我们该怎么办？
‎科拉的尸体就躺在我房间里呢 ‎得把他弄出去

translation.en: -How? Shit! -I don't know! [whimpers]
What?
What?
Talk.
Fuck! What are we doing?
-Kemi, at least can we-- -Chill.
translation.zh:
‎-凯蜜 我们能不能至少…
‎-冷静

translation.en: We can do this. We have to do this.
translation.zh: ‎我们能行的 我们必须这么做

translation.en: Just breathe.
All right, let's go.
-Shit. [in Pidgin] Please, can you come to this side?
translation.zh:
‎-见鬼
‎-拜托你跟我换个位置好吗？

translation.en: -Why? -It looks like he's staring at me.
translation.zh:
‎-为什么？
‎-从这边看 感觉他在盯着我

translation.en: Do you want him to be staring at me?
You're not the one that was supposed to marry this man.
-You're right, it's fine. -[exhales]
-We start from the head. -Oh no, Kemi. What's that?
translation.zh:
‎-从头开始切
‎-不是吧 凯蜜 搞什么啊？

translation.en: Don't you watch those beheading videos? Start from the head, there's less bones.
translation.zh:
‎你没看过斩首视频吗？
‎从头开始砍 骨头比较少

translation.en: Actually, I've never watched a beheading video.
We start from the head. [exhales]
[gasps] [in Pidgin] Okay, please, I need a drink.
Can you help me check the mini bar?
What's that?
It's-- It's Kola's phone.
Don't pick it up. Cut.
Okay.
[groans] We need to do this now.
Hey, uh, bro, I'm just trying to find out where the hell you are.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 哥们 你他妈到底去哪儿了？

translation.en: And you'd better have a good excuse for this.
translation.zh: ‎你最好给我一个合理的解释

translation.en: Guy, please, just let me know you're okay, hmm?
translation.zh: ‎兄弟 拜托 跟我报个平安好吧？

translation.en: [groans] Oh God.
Shit. Oh no. Okay.
We're gonna need another plan.
There is no way on earth we can cut up his whole body.
translation.zh: ‎我们根本搞不定分尸这种事

translation.en: No way.
-What? -Carry it. Just carry it.
Sarah!
Just put it.
[in Pidgin] Are you still doing laundry at this time?
Yes, it's the guest laundry from the wedding.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 是婚宴客人的换洗衣物

translation.en: The manager sent us.
This wedding? Wow.
Where do you think Mr. Ademola is hiding?
translation.zh: ‎你们觉得阿德默拉先生躲哪儿去了？

translation.en: -[scoffs] I don't know. -We don't know. We have to go.
translation.zh:
‎-不知道
‎-不知道 我们得走了

translation.en: That man didn't want to marry, that's why he ran.
translation.zh: ‎那男人不想结婚 所以他跑了

translation.en: If you think about it, it's the bride's fault.
translation.zh: ‎仔细想想 这全怪那个新娘

translation.en: The bride looks like someone who would want to control her husband.
translation.zh: ‎那女人瞧着就像是个悍妇控制狂

translation.en: It's her fault.
[in English] No one can tell me otherwise.
[in English] Hey! Sarah. Let's go. Focus.
-[camera beeps, clicks] -What the hell are these two up to?
-[engine sputters] -Come on.
Come on. Come on.
[groans] Damn it!
This fucking car!
-Almost there. -Okay.
-[whispering] Okay, sorry. -It's okay.
Let's go. Let's dig!
